protein.general_function: Involved in phosphotransferase activity, alcohol group as acceptor
protein.specific_function: Key enzyme in the regulation of glycerol uptake and metabolism (By similarity).

pathway.name: glycerol degradation via glycerol kinase pathway

go_class.description: phosphotransferase activity, alcohol group as acceptor

reference.reference_text: Sargent CA, Young C, Marsh S, Ferguson-Smith MA, Affara NA: The glycerol kinase gene family: structure of the Xp gene, and related intronless retroposons. Hum Mol Genet. 1994 Aug;3(8):1317-24.
